remarks: Value of scalar product operation value for the closed kernel vector space dual.  (Contributed by NM, 28-Mar-2015.)
statement:
lcdvsval.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lcdvsval.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcdvsval.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
lcdvsval.s $e |- S = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
lcdvsval.r $e |- R = ( Base ` S ) $.
lcdvsval.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` S ) $.
lcdvsval.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcdvsval.f $e |- F = ( Base ` C ) $.
lcdvsval.m $e |- .xb = ( .s ` C ) $.
lcdvsval.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
lcdvsval.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. R ) $.
lcdvsval.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. F ) $.
lcdvsval.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
lcdvsval $p |- ( ph -> ( ( X .xb G ) ` A ) = ( ( G ` A ) .x. X ) ) $.
